amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language which provides the death penalty for the killing of a federally funded public safety officer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-279 to remove the death penalty for the killing of Federally funded public safety officers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 325 (Roll no. 583).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 325 (Roll no. 583).
